text: Por maaŋ nzua vov, khaŋ mba gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuai. “Gu zumgum taagia zav Zerusareman ndav, gu vov Fhe Bakɨme phena bɨna vhen vergap, Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav kav, gu rɨma kui fhara muuŋgiap Guma Bakɨme gangi. Gu ana garim, ana khaŋ na nzuai, ‘Ndu vhemkora Zerusarem thav khavgi ŋgɨri. Ndu kha ŋgu bakɨmera nan buni vhuuiŋ bun suanga, kha gumgi gu mbigi, mbe ndu khothɨgɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara.’
